name: Individual Blueberry Cheesecakes
description: The surprise in this creamy, tangy cheesecake is a layer of blueberries over a graham cracker crust.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup finely crushed graham cracker crumbs
4 ounces cream cheese, at room temperature

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, blend together crumbs and butter until combined. Divide mixture between two 8-ounce mugs and press into bottom with fingers. Place mugs in freezer and let chill for ten minutes.
In a medium bowl, beat together cream cheese and condensed milk until combined. Add lemon juice and vanilla and beat to incorporate.
Take mugs out of freezer and line bottom of each with blueberries. Cover blueberries with filling and smooth top with a knife.
Cover mugs and let rest in refrigerator for 3 hours, then serve.
